item.title: Principal roadmap
item.description: First 6-Month Principal Engineer Plan Mindset Shift You’re no longer measured by code you write. You’re measured by: How many people deliver better systems because Principal exists. Overall Outcomes by Month 6 Principal should be known as the person who: Owns technical direction across teams Has improved delivery velocity or quality measurably Is a trusted advisor to Product, Architecture and Leadership Has created at least 1 lasting technical system or standard Month 1 — Learn, Map, Earn Trust Goals Understand business, product, and org reality.
